unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Brand Collabs Galore!**
normalised: Okay folks, social media's buzzing! This festive season, particularly leading up to Onam down South, brands are going collab-crazy! Everyone's teaming up – from local saree brands in Kanchipuram partnering with Instagram influencers to online biryani delivery services hooking up with food bloggers.

unnormalised: Okay folks, social media's buzzing! This festive season, particularly leading up to Onam down South, brands are going collab-crazy! Everyone's teaming up – from local saree brands in Kanchipuram partnering with Instagram influencers to online biryani delivery services hooking up with food bloggers.
normalised: We're seeing some seriously creative campaigns. Take, for example, "Sharmaji's Sweets" in Delhi collaborating with a gaming influencer – totally unexpected, right? Apparently, gamers crave gulab jamun!

unnormalised: We're seeing some seriously creative campaigns. Take, for example, "Sharmaji's Sweets" in Delhi collaborating with a gaming influencer – totally unexpected, right? Apparently, gamers crave gulab jamun!
normalised: Even bigger players are getting in on the action. I I T Bombay alumni startup, "CodeNinjas," partnered with a popular YouTube tech reviewer. Reviews are drawing eyeballs with the giveaway prize being an all-expenses-paid trip to Bangalore!

unnormalised: Even bigger players are getting in on the action. IIT Bombay alumni startup, "CodeNinjas," partnered with a popular YouTube tech reviewer. Reviews are drawing eyeballs with the giveaway prize being an all-expenses-paid trip to Bangalore!
normalised: Analysts estimate that these collaborations are driving rupees fifty crore (approximately) in additional revenue this quarter alone. But are these partnerships actually authentic, or just blatant ads disguised as genuine endorsements? We're keeping a close watch! Also, can these collaborations drive brand awareness across one thousand five hundred plus kilometer? Only time will tell. Stay tuned for more!
